alert.note: Alert for Cave Creek, New River; Fountain Hills, East Mesa; Mazatzal Mountains; New River Mesa; Rio Verde, Salt River (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 06 at 3:51PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Maricopa County through 430 PM MST... At 351 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Rio Verde, or 10 miles west of Sugarloaf Mountain, moving southwest at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Scottsdale, Fountain Hills, Rio Verde, McDowell Mountain Park and Fort McDowell. This includes AZ Route 87 between mile markers 189 and 194. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Cave Creek, New River; Fountain Hills, East Mesa; Mazatzal Mountains; New River Mesa; Rio Verde, Salt River
